storyInfo: Pinus Sylvestris, in the middle of mourning their friend's passing, sight a mysterious guest. Meanwhile, Nightmare Knight pays a visit to Marcin's bar, and the Radiant Knight is pulled away by the Candle Knight after a match, dodging the ring of reporters.

attributes.content: Welcome back, Iwona.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: You look like murder.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: No shit I do.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Didn't get to mangle every last inch of those knight sons of bitches' armor... grr.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: It wasn't your fault.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: He didn't tell any of us how bad it'd gotten.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: With an infection like that, he should've stepped aside months ago.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: He should've found his way out of Kazimierz, followed his dreams. Should've gotten to sort out his final days.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Olmer Ingra... the Kawalerielki knight noble to a T. Despotic, ignorant, no regard for human life.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: I should've broken all four of his limbs in the arena when I had the chance...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: It's not your fault either, Ashlock.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Dammit. And I was right there!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Did he... say anything... in his final moments?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You wouldn't want to know.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: On the contrary, I wish I could.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Fine.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: It's not rare at all... for Infected to pass on with regrets.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: We'll remember his anger.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Sona?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: His name was Jamie. He was a competition knight, and then an Infected after an accident.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: He went through a divorce. He had a sweet little girl. He must've been underreporting his condition so he could keep on competing... He needed the money.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But in order to underreport his condition, he'd have to bribe the Knights Association.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: I found the letters between him and the Association staff in his room. It was a bottomless pit.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: He was the optimistic type. So optimistic to the point he couldn't even tell the sort of burden he was shouldering.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: He caught Oripathy, he parted ways with his wife and daughter, but he kept on helping people.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Do you still remember? He was always up at the crack of dawn just to look after the kids.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: He shouldn't have died in this indignity. It goes against the founding intent of our Knightclub, but...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But I can't get over it...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: It was the end of the end, and someone so filled with passion for life, in his final moments, let loose such haunting, unforgettable hate.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: If this is how things are—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...Sona.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: You've had too much on your mind lately. Careful you don't get so fixated.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: ...I'm gonna leave all this knotty thinking work to you guys.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I'm gonna get stronger. Strong enough to crush those sanctimonious bastards between my fingers. Strong enough to clear the way all by myself.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The Blood Knight's a fine example. Since at least Kazimierz recognizes a 'knight' these days, that's the path we should be take.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Don't overthink stuff, Sona. It'll only slow you down.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: ...Sona!
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Alright, alright, I get it. We need to step it up and check with Szewczyk—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The wind... there was a change in the wind's stirring. Even if just for a moment...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Someone's watching this place, and not just that...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: The Armorless?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: They know how to mask their breathing. But if they're after us, they should've attacked by now.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: —Come out.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: This is Infected territory. No uninfected would ever just wander in here.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: If you don't—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Alright, alright. Keep the noise down, sheesh.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Never dreamed I'd see Infected knights around. I haven't been anywhere near Kawalerielki in over ten years, but the knight bosses and businessfolk are all out of their minds.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Don't get me wrong, I was in the neighborhood looking for someone. But, well, this might just be meant to be...
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: ...I'm thinking we share some of the same interests, my Infected friends. Like... the Armorless Union.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Sorry, but we've been through some very unfortunate things today. If you really want to chat, try some other day.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Oh? That's some rotten luck indeed. My condolences.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Then I can only go somewhere else and try my luck there. Not every day I visit the Grand Knight Territory, after all.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I'll leave you all be, then... but we might see each other again very soon.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I found the knight who took Szewczyk. The runaway Fartooth Knight.
She's mingling with Pinus Sylvestris, of course. Infected knights have a way of sticking together—
—What's that noise on your end? Are you at a bar again?
Fine, looking into the Nightzmora's background, that's a decent excuse. When's the order being issued regarding the Infected?
...What?
Didn't the Szewczyk case end up like this precisely because they were 'still officially meeting to decide?' They sent a whole drone to bomb him—what point is there in still...
Well, jeez... tell me all you like, but the Major's running right now no matter what you say. They can't be all that cavalier about deciding.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Yep, mm-hm, I'm not slacking one bit, trust me.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: It's true—hey, boss, you got any fries?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: One moment.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Cool. Hey? Monique, you still there?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: ...Classic, she hung up.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Here's your fries, sir.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Oh, nice. Appreciate it.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Mm...! Who's the genius who came up with slicing a tater this thin and frying it too? The world wouldn't be so beautiful without you, whoever you are.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Come to think of it, that real standout Maria Nearl, she graces this place pretty often with Whislash Knight, if I'm remembering right?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: If you came looking for an autograph, you'd better be extra lucky.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: After all, this bar's for nothing but old retired fogies.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Who's that there? Couldn't be an Armorless Union spy?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: God knows, he hasn't tried anything. Not like we can frisk him, either... hey, is he sizing you up?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Hrrm... just ignore him.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I've been getting the twitchiest eyes since last night... Can't shake the feeling something big's going to happen.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Finally hit the right age for insomnia?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Eh? I'm fit as a fiddle! What do you know! It was the twitches back then that told me we had incoming artillery fire—
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: What the hell big's going to happen to you? Are you going to squeeze olive oil out of your toothpaste tomorrow morning?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: —Hmm.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Marcin. I can sense their aura now... it's someone major.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I've never had a premonition strange as this before... here's hoping they won't make trouble.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: (Here they come. Nice and fast, too... mmm, I'll just let it happen.)
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: –– (Ancient language) The young hunter sets out on his Khaganquest ♪
–– (Ancient language) From dreams he goes, towards the shores of gold ♪
(This language...!)
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: What's going on? Kids these days wander into bars singing their own songs? What's the point of the jukebox, then?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: The Nearls' light can't really have stuck to my lonely little bar, can it? But I've never met a knight like you in my time... V? What's wrong?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: I... I don't know, it's just suddenly my heart feels a little...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: (Ancient language) ...Batbayar, brethren, the last descendant.
(Ancient language) Why be in a place like this?
You...! You know that name?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: The silent knight looks around. Where his gaze touches, the light hides.
Answer me. How do you know that name?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Hey, V, this a friend of yours?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Would you like a drink? Sir? If you've got no business, I have to tell you we don't welcome armed knights too warmly here.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: (Ancient language) How sorry this is.
Hold on, don't just up and go—
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Kowal, Maria will be borrowing your workshop a while longer—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: —Er.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Zo—Zofia, slow down... agh!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Why did you—stop, what's going on?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...You are...
...Nightmare Knight?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: What's the rising star of the year doing here? Are you trying to sneak out intel on Maria and Margaret?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: If so—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: How clamorous.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Watch out!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Wh... What are you trying to do here!?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Pegasus... a weak race. Only those pegasi with blood of flowing gold are worthy rivals.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: But once the pegasi abdicated, this so-called 'Land of the Knights'...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Its grasslands turned feeble. You cannot be blind to it, can you, Kuranta?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: In present Kazimierz, you people, all are called knights?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: And in those... pompous arenas, you test your martial skills?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: After your little act just now, I'm not finding the will to talk to you all nice and happy.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Hold it... boy, I still have things to ask you. The last thing I want right now is to put a bolt through your head.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Not bad... you have the will to fight still.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: What about you, then?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Uh, me? Like, me? I'm just a fan of knights, just in the neighborhood. No need to waste the effort pretending I exist, I'll be fine.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I can't do a thing anyway, not a single thing, mm-hm.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: (Tremoriron Marcin, proficient with warhammers. Vogelweide, campaign knight marksman. Whislash Knight, not much of a threat since she was injured... Maria, no need to monitor for the time being.)
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: (But none of that really matters... mm-hm... the Nightzmora came looking for Vogelweide after all...)
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: (Alright... now... what to do. Will the Radiant Knight come?)
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: This place is not worth even a quick visit. Keeping company with you people makes one uneasy to stand still.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Alright, boy, who d'you think you're looking down on?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: (Ancient language) Batbayar, in the past you campaigned on the battlesands, fought with your own two hands, yet could only barely manage to protect your homeland.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: (What's he saying?!)
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: War... you're a campaign knight? You recognize me?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: (Ancient language) No, I'm no 'knight.' Nothing so ridiculous. Simply put, war is the only path in which you never shamed your ancestry, descendant.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: (Ancient language) Though you stand here... in this city of steel and concrete, neon flitting through the rain, descendant, I hope you can still remember the breathing of the grasslands, and the vow the Khagan swore.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Khagan? What...?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You're going on about some stodgy old tale?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: (Ancient language) I intended... before setting out once again, to seek my surviving brethren in this so-called land of the knights. It seems, now, I was simply deluded.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: (Ancient language) No matter.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: (Ancient language) Kazimierz's frailty spits on Khagan's accomplishments. Someone must set such conduct straight.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Stop right there! You still haven't answered me!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Hm... Though now you've lost all that made you, you're still at least half a brother... I should answer your question.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: It was an old veteran who told me your name, and he, he was ruined in his age, not even able to run.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I seek every one of my brethren in Kazimierz. No matter how weak their relation, I seek them and nothing more.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Come again? Brethren? In Kazimierz, is that right?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: It's no longer your concern, Kazimierzian.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Hold it.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Nightmare Knight... I've heard plenty about the badly-behaved newcomer you were.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You should've known we wouldn't let you go so easily after you kindly brandished your sword at us.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: How about you take off your helmet and we have a nice chat?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: 'Nightmare'...? Ah, the title those city slaves plastered on me without permission?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Ridiculous... that knights are so obsessed with these names now...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: It is only their inherent beliefs, and desire to grasp destiny, that urge knights to embark on their journey.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: The Knights Association won't be happy to look the other way with you picking arguments like this. Do you want to be stripped of Major qualifications?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: If... only vapid knights like you remain in Kazimierz... then I really am wasting my energy. What harm would losing worthless qualifications be?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: However, this pegasus by your side... seems to very much resemble someone I wanted to find...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: What?! You mean... my sister?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: —What do you want with the Radiant Knight?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: What I want...? Look at all the Grand Knights Kazimierz elevates as champions—if there remains any opponent worth conquering in this present country, I fear it may be among them.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Of course... it may also happen that they're all disappointments.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You've gone mad, haven't you. You came here just for a fight?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: (Ancient language) Mad?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: (Ancient language) Yes... the people who choose to live in the Kazimierz of now often tell me so...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: (Ancient language) ...which is why we are no longer brethren.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I said stop! Are you just leaving like nothing even happened?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Given this endeavor is fruitless, I have no need to stay...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Goodbye, descendant.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Grr...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: What in the world was wrong with that man, all high and mighty...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I can only hope Margaret doesn't meet him in the arena.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Seems he came for a quick look at you, then? Is he from your home place?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: He's... a Nightzmora?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: What? There's still Nightzmora alive today?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Here I thought they were all in legends, or they were holing up in Sargon or some sort.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: So what? What's someone from your grandpa's grandpa's side doing finding you?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: ...He's calling to us.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: ...Tch.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Oh! Oh! This is history, being made before our eyes!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Can 'Left-hand' Tytus Topola lead the Bladehelm Knightclub in a breakthrough here, and return to his spot as one of the top sixteen tyrants?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This battle reeks of revenge! All of you watching! I hope your blood's on fire! He's fallen short of the Final 16 over and over, but today, will 'Left-hand' Tytus Topola have what it takes to overcome himself?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: It all comes down to one thing—his opponent!!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: In the long and storied history that is the Topola family's knightly record, only one time! Only one opponent! Has brought such colossal shame!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Damn you...
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: What have you been doing, all these years?!
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: (Why... to hell with this...)
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: (How do I fight now? Do I make some room? No, she... hff... why is she using a swordspear, of all the things...)
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: (Most important...)
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: (...is that she... somehow has me... pressured?)
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Tytus Topola shuts his eyes.
He considers this a scene of impassioned vengeance, a long-brewing opportunity to prove his worth.
But all his resentment, visions and fervor, have here and now vanished like smoke.
He cannot help but concede, this is no standoff.
Only a challenge.
A challenge, striding for the pinnacle.
(Since I became the Bladehelm Knightclub's frontman, when was the last time I felt like this?)
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: A challenge, an advance, climbing to an ever higher domain.
Hah... heheh, it makes me want to laugh...
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight, are you truly the same woman?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: To force me back to this degree... and yet you don't feel a hair of pride, not a drop of excitement? Where did the mettlesome you of yesteryear go?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Look at you now, so serene one could gag—
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: I don't mean to look down on you, Tytus. I never have.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: However, you've already lost your way.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: In the hunt that was the melee, at least, you were the last one standing. You forced your way free on nothing but a single arm like you had originally done, imbued purely with the desire to win.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Hahah... you've even learned to preach, now? Could it be? Your days of banishment have made you the lecturesome kind?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: ...Tytus.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Why would you let those logos bind you?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: —Listen, Radiant Knight!
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Weren't you always prattling on and on about those rancid traditions... urging us to—use the most traditional methods to decide victory?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: A charge, a skirmish, an all-expending effort.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: I will trample... all that you are!
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Left-hand Knight is composed and steady! Does he plan to decide this with one final plunge?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: And the Radiant Knight is—now the Radiant Knight's slowly raising that bizarre weapon—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Who will be stand victorious after this final clash? What are you waiting for, audience?! You have the power to show your support for these knights, so do it—!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Is that the Candle Knight, Droste? What's she here for?
attributes.name: A Passing Tourist A

attributes.content: Maybe she's waiting for someone... quit staring, hurry up and sneak a picture... who knows if we can hit on some major scandal...
attributes.name: A Passing Tourist B

attributes.content: The Candle Knight! Madam, I'm very sorry to leave you unattended. Are you looking for someone?
attributes.name: An Arena Worker

attributes.content: It's alright, it was brash to come without notifying anyone. I just wanted to take a look at how the Radiant Knight cuts her figure.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: After all, I imagine it's almost over.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Yes, Left-hand Knight Sir Tytus Topola lost ten minutes ago to the Radiant Knight. Sir Tytus has incredible strength, but he can't be too hopeful after falling into the losers' bracket in the first round.
attributes.name: An Arena Worker

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Did you... really come just to meet the Radiant Knight?
attributes.name: An Arena Worker

attributes.content: I want to see. See just how different she is now, compared to what I've heard in the rumors of knights.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: All the crowd's gone rushing over.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: R—Right. Actually, ever since the Radiant Knight officially returned to competition, she's barely cooperated with our standard service activities.
attributes.name: An Arena Worker

attributes.content: She constantly leaves arenas without saying a word, and scheduled interviews and all sorts of PR items get rejected. It really makes your head spin.
attributes.name: An Arena Worker

attributes.content: Though actually, I think there's even more reporters mobbing the Radiant Knight than usual today. I wonder what that's about?
attributes.name: An Arena Worker

attributes.content: Ah... sorry, can you just let me through...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Miss Margaret, what are your views on the Infected knight who passed away on the field? Will this affect you in any way?
attributes.name: An Excited Reporter

attributes.content: Madam Radiant Knight, do you have anything to say about the Knights Association's recent decision? Can infection actually contribute to an unfair playing field?
attributes.name: A Pushy Reporter

attributes.content: Ah, Miss Margaret, is it possible to reveal anything about the state of your infection? Can you confirm if the Knights Association's measures to keep it confidential are a disservice to the spectators and the other knights?
attributes.name: An Excited Reporter

attributes.content: There are reports of you getting close to a few Sarkaz women! Who are they to you? Give an explanation, please!
attributes.name: An Excited Reporter

attributes.content: Madam Radiant Knight! Please respond—do you intend to become the spiritual leader of the Infected knights?
attributes.name: A Pushy Reporter

attributes.content: —Will you be the second coming of the Blood Knight—
attributes.name: A Pushy Reporter

attributes.content: I won't be answering your questions.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Can we take that as an admission? Then what relation do you and those Sarkaz—
attributes.name: An Excited Reporter

attributes.content: Well met, Madam Nearl.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: And you are...?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The Candle Knight, Droste! The Candle Knight was waiting outside the arena for the Radiant Knight!
attributes.name: An Excited Reporter

attributes.content: Give the schedule printout to me... that's right, they'll meet each other on the field... hey, get a snap of this, quickly! Snap it!
attributes.name: A Pushy Reporter

attributes.content: May we... walk and talk?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: (I presume you don't want the media haranguing you any longer, either?)
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Ah... yes.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Right then. Let's go somewhere else.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I'm sorry, please keep your distance—the press conference will be held at a later time, please can everyone just be patient for now! Patience, please!
attributes.name: An Arena Worker

attributes.content: Now then...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You've been through a lot, legend of Kazimierz.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Your banishment has conversely cast much of a veil of mystery on 'The Radiant Knight'... the holy, haloed knight, the awe-inspiring golden pegasus, the hero who returned like a shooting star...
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: I saw as I came close today, you were still very young, and disconcerted by such a sudden situation... Margaret Nearl, this is the real, living person.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Come what may, I thank you for helping me just now.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I assume you're a knight too, though I don't believe I know you?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: It's been a while since someone asked me who I was. More than who I am, they care who they wish I was.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Er, I'm very sorry. I haven't been back in Kazimierz for too long...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...Heheh.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Are you concerned that because you don't recognize me... I may fly into a rage?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: I can tell, you're quite unlike anyone else.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: My, now, thank you for the praise.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: I'm very pleased myself to get to know such a Radiant Knight. My name is Viviana Droste.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Or perhaps, you may also call me The Candle Knight.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: The Candle Knight... no, Miss Droste, thank you once again for your help today. Were you seeking me for any reason?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Before long, we'll face each other on the field.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: You are an Infected, and one who was once met with banishment. Make no mistake, I have no habit of connecting with my opponents before a match.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: I come from Leithanien; I am an expatriate, living in this bustling city under an identity I could never imagine.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Kazimierz's recognition is already yours, Miss Droste.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I hear the Radiant Knight never approved of the current system of knighthood, and so, you were consequently banished. Do you still feel the same way?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: The knights of Kazimierz are forgetting their obligation as we speak.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Have you ever been to the most destitute corners of Kazimierz? Conflict, starvation, infection... the common person suffers enormously, while the knights hide in their cities, making great shows of peace and prosperity.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The spirit of knighthood is almost completely lost. It's a legacy for capital to wantonly toy with.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: How is it not a form of disgrace?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...I see.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: It seems—it is you who stands as a true knight.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: But you are... still no more than a knight.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: How about your sister? She's been active on the field for the past while.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Has she renounced... the path of knighthood?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Miss Droste... and Miss Margaret, good evening.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Good evening, Mr. McKee.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Thank you for tending to the commotion just now.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*. So you do have that much self-awareness...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: With two Grand Knights such as yourselves, the masses could make each and every move a hot topic. Put the two of you together in front of the media...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: But never mind all that, there's always some way to sort it out. Miss Droste, you should be preparing for your meeting with the Leithanian noble tomorrow.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: If you would, I'd appreciate you avoid exacerbating uncertain factors for the next while.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Such as, meeting with an Infected knight?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: It seems the noble in question has come for your sake, Miss Droste. You have a celebrity status to the Leithanians too.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Mieszko Industries is very willing to assist them with construction planning in Leithanien, but the one putting the final seal on this trade contract is you, Miss Droste.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Of course... it is my obligation.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: It seems I must apologize, Madam Radiant Knight, that I'm unable to continue my chat with you tonight.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: It's alright. You gave me a pleasant surprise... that Kazimierz still has knights such as yourself.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The next we meet will be on the field.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I look forward to the day.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: A final word of advice... Madam Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: The storm is nearing.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: The trails will be especially radiant in the starry sky, these coming days of ours.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight
